course_title: Special Topics in PE: Advanced Wilderness First Aid

class_notes: First aid and emergency response for outdoor enthusiasts and leaders. Upon successful completion of the course, students earn a SOLO AWFA certification. Additional book fees required. Course dates: Jan 21, 22, 28, 29 (9am-5pm) Instructor approval required for registration email kslige2@emory.edu.
course_description: Course based on selected topics of interest in fitness and exercise. Activity focus will vary. May be repeated (up to 2 credit hours) for credit when topic varies.
